data.text: @chohaseul Yes you must! Please eat well and drink some water mom and have enough rest okay?

@JlNSOUL It is, indeed. I can’t help but to feel apologetic. We have prepared a lot 😔💔 but I can never put myself on the thoughts of putting everyone else in danger, so quarantine it is. Please stay healthy!! 🥺

@xiaotig Meeting this sweetheart right here surely will be my motivation to get better really soon! 🥺 Thank you so much, sweetheart. I hope the filming earlier went all well and safe. Please stay healthy! 🤍

@n_dawon I will be just fine, love! Just like how everyone else overcome it, I will do so. It’s a real let down that we have prepared so much for the show, but we never want to put everyone else in danger right? 

I hope you feel better soon as well. You have all of my love and support 💗
@Heezzine I will! So will Vivi unnie and Yeojinnie. You know how strong we are, right? 💗
@chohaseul you will be okay so soon. 🥺🤍
@chohaseul Please get well soon, unnie. Come back healthy so we can meet with each other!🥺🤍
@chohaseul Mom, get well soon okay? Don't be too stressed over this. You'll be okay, rest well for now mom🤍
@tteonuya Thank you, son. I will recover well and come back better than ever, promise! ♡

@chohaseul HASEULIE GET WELL SOON... 😭 This is so unfortunate. Regardless of us having a schedule or not, to hear my sisters get sick- it's very heartbreaking. I WISHED I can take care of you three but that's not possible. I'm so frustrated right now I'm gonna miss annoying you everyday 💔
